column1: Odysseus' crew take on the the challenge to accompany Odysseus to explore the island
column2: but only 12 of them are selected.

column1: The owner of the cave has returned.
Odysseus told the men to hide and wait till tomorrow.
Odysseus and his men carry the stake and poke the cyclops' eye out,

column2: the other cyclops come to the cave

column1: Odysseus order his men to hide under the sheep. With that
column2: they were able to escape since the cyclops only felt the top of each lamb.
